response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a unique chance to own something truly exceptional. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
